name: GaGa
description:
Prototyping a game where you're a duck and have to collect fruit. Getting myself involved in the Pico-8 and itch.io scenes.

This is by no means a complete game, i am just learning.

Controls:

  • Left and Right arrows

Gameplay: Collect the fruit, +1 point for collection, -2 points for missing fruit. Get to zero or below and its GAME OVER
